settings.html:
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.6.0.min.js"></script>
<script>

var $ = jQuery,
    clickLock = false

$(document).ready(function(){


$('.my-nav .elementor-icon-list-item').on('click', function(){
    $('.my-nav .elementor-icon-list-item').removeClass('active')
    $(this).addClass('active')
    clickLock = true
    setTimeout(function(){
        clickLock = false
    },500)
})

})

var hash = true

$(window).on('load', function(){
    $('.elementor-icon-list-item a').each(function(){
        if( $(this).attr('href') == location.protocol+'//'+location.host+location.pathname ){
            hash = false
            $(this).parent().addClass('active')
        }
    })
})

$('.my-bar').on('click', function(){
    
    $('.my-nav').slideToggle()
    
})

$('.day-night').on('click', function(){
    
    var icon = $(this).find('i')
    if( icon.hasClass('fa-moon') ){
        icon.removeClass('fa-moon')
        icon.addClass('fa-sun')
    }else{
        icon.removeClass('fa-sun')
        icon.addClass('fa-moon')
    }
    $('body').toggleClass('night')
})

$(window).on('load scroll', function(){
    
    if( !hash || clickLock ) return
    
    var ids = [],
        id
    
    $('.elementor > .elementor-element').each(function(){
        if($(window).scrollTop() + $(window).height() - 350 > $(this).offset().top){
            ids.push($(this).attr('id'))
        }
    })
    
    ids = ids.filter(element => {
      return element !== undefined
    })
    
    id = ids[ids.length - 1]
    
    $('.elementor-icon-list-item').removeClass('active')
    $('[href="#'+id+'"]').parent().addClass('active')
})


// Back to Top Button

var offset = 300

$(window).on('load scroll', function(){
    
    if( $(window).scrollTop() > offset ){
        $('body').addClass('show')
    }else{
        $('body').removeClass('show')
    }
})

var headerOffset = 10

$(window).on('load scroll', function(){
    
    if( $(window).scrollTop() > headerOffset ){
        $('body').addClass('header-show')
    }else{
        $('body').removeClass('header-show')
    }
})

</script>

<style>
.elementor-widget-testimonial-carousel,
.elementor-widget-reviews{
    max-width: 100%;
}
</style>
